text: Glenn van Berlo (born 21 January 2002) is a Dutch racing driver from Veghel currently racing for Drivex in the Euroformula Open Championship. ==Career== ===Karting=== van Berlo started karting in 2011 where he drove in the Chrono Dutch Rotax Max Challenge. Before entering single seaters van Berlo won karting titles such as the 2012 Chrono Dutch Rotax Max Challenge and the BNL Karting Series. ===Spanish F4=== In 2019 van Berlo stepped up to his first season in single seaters where he drove for MP Motorsport. In his first race he finished on the podium behind eventual champion Franco Colapinto and Omani Shihab Al Habsi. Throughout the season van Berlo scored 222 points along with 10 podiums and 3 wins, he fell short of the title behind Argentine Colapinto by 103 points and only missed out on second place by 5 points behind Spaniard Kilian Meyer. ===Euroformula Open Championship=== van Berlo was announced to drive for Drivex in mid-February ==Racing record== ===Career summary=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 90%; text-align:center" |- !
